review: Nice view, great location, great service.

name: untara
review: Good and recommend for family or business.

name: Rosmeryati
review: Good food, good people. Nice place. loved.

name: Ifa P.
review: Nice hotel, large and clean room.

name: Erlyta N.
review: I brought my baby 1 year old and the staff were very helpful! Room clean, bathroom a little bit ancient but it‚Äôs OK. Thank you.

name: Hengky W.
review: Spacy room. Swimming pool ok, but the bathroom still in renof. The breakfast nice with variety of food.

name: Yosua A.
review: Great service, the food was okay. Too bad they didn't provide omelette station. The room was spaceful and clean. Location was strategic. But no bell boy/concierge.

name: Bernhard M. H.
review: It's so clean, my daughter is so happy. Thank you Grand Rohan.

name: Rommy S.
review: Good services, Clean and comfort.

name: Guest-zhkaur
review: Nice and cozy. The staff were friendly. Great place to stay especially for moslems

name: Sigit H.
review: My family was satisfy, my children was very enjoy and so happy stayed in the hotel Grand Rohan, over all was OK, only one thing that need to fix it it 's about the food in Seroja restaurant, üò•. Unfortunattely for the breakfast was'nt good, for example when I took chicken porridge and soto it was tasteless, some staff also was'nt friendly, especially security. Hotel is hospitality industry, smile and greeting to the guest is part of your duty. My conclusion, this hotel still recomended.

name: Dwi S. C.
review: Very comfy, the hospitality was nice, all toiletries and other supporting kit is very thoughtful, the lighting and balcony concept also nice, provide sarung, mukena and sajadah. The food also has many variations, always refilled until the closing time.

name: Rena N. U.
review: Staffs were very friendly, professional, and helpful. Clean & comfortable guest room, large swimming pool, tasty & various menu for breakfast. They held jum'at prayer too in their mosque. Just no hair dryer in guest room, so we need to call house keeping first, but that 's okay. Will definitely come back to Grand Rohan again.

name: Ghandie K. W.
review: When I checked in, I asked for my ID card. It has been shown that 22 are husband and wife. Already ok. 23:20 when people want to take a break. The officers approached and asked for a marriage certificate. 23.20. In the middle of the night ask for the marriage book. It's great to make guests comfortable! Don't stay here anymore. Looking for comfort is even suspicious.

name: Lianawati
review: Wifi access from the time the lights went out couldn't work at all until night. It's been reset, it still doesn't work until I check out.

name: M Fajar P. P.
review: The staff is friendly, the condition of the hotel is clean, the food is quite good. Highly recommended.

name: Decty D.
review: Satisfied, clean and spacious rooms, fast check-in process.

name: sufi a.
review: Family friendly hotel. Children are happy. Prayer equipment is already there so don't bother if you forget to bring it.

name: Marsya
review: The best sharia hotel in Jogja, in my opinion, complete facilities, the staff is always friendly, the service is very good and fast, I like worship so it's easy here because there is a mosque and it's comfortable, the rooms are provided with sarongs and the Koran too. Very comfortable my family and I stayed 4 days 3 nights here.

name: Sri E. P.
review: The hotel is clean and comfortable. The breakfast menu is varied and all delicious. The hotel staff are all friendly. I stayed moving around while in Jogya and finally returned to Grand Rohan Junior High School on the last day of my holiday.

name: Naufal A. H.
review: The rooms are clean, the service is good and fast, there are prayer mats, sarongs and mukena in the room.

name: Rena N. U.
review: Staffs were very friendly, professional, and helpful. Clean & comfortable guest room, large swimming pool, tasty & various menu for breakfast. They held jum'at prayer too in their mosque. Just no hair dryer in guest room, so we need to call house keeping first, but that 's okay. Will definitely come back to Grand Rohan again.

name: Sigit H.
review: My family was satisfy, my children was very enjoy and so happy stayed in the hotel Grand Rohan, over all was OK, only one thing that need to fix it it 's about the food in Seroja restaurant, üò•. Unfortunattely for the breakfast was'nt good, for example when I took chicken porridge and soto it was tasteless, some staff also was'nt friendly, especially security. Hotel is hospitality industry, smile and greeting to the guest is part of your duty. My conclusion, this hotel still recomended.

name: Dwi S. C.
review: Very comfy, the hospitality was nice, all toiletries and other supporting kit is very thoughtful, the lighting and balcony concept also nice, provide sarung, mukena and sajadah. The food also has many variations, always refilled until the closing time.

name: Yosua A.
review: Great service, the food was okay. Too bad they didn't provide omelette station. The room was spaceful and clean. Location was strategic. But no bell boy/concierge.

name: Bernhard M. H.
review: It's so clean, my daughter is so happy. Thank you Grand Rohan.

review: Good services, Clean and comfort.

review: Nice and cozy. The staff were friendly. Great place to stay especially for moslems

name: Abu B.
review: Recommended hotels. Complete facilities.

name: Moh A. M.
review: Highly recommended, especially Muslim. Very Special Food.

name: Rizky R. K.
review: Very nice and comfortable Islamic hotel. The hotel rooms are clean, the Koran is provided, and complete prayer tools, cold air conditioning, good wifi connection, various types of food and all delicious. The swimming pool is spacious, the hotel staff are all friendly, the parking lot is spacious, the hotel location is strategically close to the city center. Every prayer time there is the sound of the call to prayer from inside the hotel, masyaallah a memorable stay. Next time we go to Jogja, we will definitely come back to stay at Grand Rohan.

name: Nanda P. M.
review: The service of all staff is very satisfying, friendly and unpretentious, I am very satisfied with the opportunity to stay at Grand Rohan Jogja. Hope see you as soon as possible.

name: Imron N.
review: Clean comfortable quiet safe top.

name: Josep C. A.
review: The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, spacious, for breakfast there are quite a lot of choices. Overall ok.

name: Taufiq A.
review: Comfortable hotel. Cold room. Hot shower water is always ready. Pool ok. Breakfast ok. The hotel staff is friendly.

name: Fitria A. P.
review: I am very happy to stay here. Very convenient, the location is very close to where JEC and Gembiraloka are going. The swimming pool is clean, there is a playground, garden, fish pond, very suitable for bringing children here. The balcony is also safe but there must still be supervision from the parents.

name: Donny B. H.
review: The room was dirty, the bedsheet and towel smell stinky, bathroom look never cleaned

name: Guest-iqtsrm
review: Room key not good so we must change the room,

name: Ingrid C.
review: Only give 1 key with deposit and can't ask for another key. Other hotel give you 1 key without deposit, deposit will be asked if you ask more key.

name: Panda
review: The room was not so clean, although they fulfilled our request, it didn't help. We got only 1 pair hotel's slipper while we stay for 2 person. The room's floor was ordinary tile floor, so it would be better if every guest got a hotel's slipper each. The parking lot was too crowded and not that spacious. They didn't over us a valet parkir at the arrival. The breakfast was so bad, they didn't have various menu, the only good food was only 'bakwan', while the rest tasted so bad. We decided to get breakfast not so early since we wanted to sleep longer, but they refilled the menu was too slow, we had to ask them to refill, more than twice. They only have 2 elevator and the hotel was full, so we ought to wait on a line to get to our room. The only thing we choose this hotel because of it's location. It is so close to Malioboro main street. We probably not gonna stay again in this hotel.

name: DayangKu N. B. A. Z.
review: Only worth the location but not value for money. Location is great, near to shopping mall, easy to find food, but the room not so good. No wardrobe, no basic need supplied such as kettle, but they provided water dispenser that located at the lift. Only worth for short stay, but not long stay

name: Aggi D.
review: For two nights, I got woken up by someone‚Äôs child screaming down the hallway and the noise outside my room. The bed is uncomfortable and the bathroom is dark.

name: Surjanto S.
review: The location is the best. But the rooms are bad. Towels color change into gray. We were asked for a nonsmoking room, but we've got a room with cigarette odor. (room 515 you can check the window, guest put their cigarettes there). Hotel maintenance is bad. See room 505 shower tap is not working properly. Room 515 door can not be opened smoothly.

name: Frans A. T.
review: very bad service. receptionist not friendly. we cant borrow a plate and spoon by phone. we must go directly to restaurant. bad service

name: lily P.
review: A self service, carrying our bags on the first day we've arrived.

name: Jamaludin M.
review: my request for 1) early check in 2) early breakfast at 5am as flight at 7am. was not granted. furthermore no mini fridge in room . would probably not staying at Amaris Malioboro again.

name: Masjhuri
review: Again the problem are the sanitation system, in wastafel drain is not flowing well, plugged it. The second, the food rather poor taste, even the material is good but maybe the cooker has not enough experience , fried rice is the same material with other fried rice in other place but here not delicious , when I order egg is too long and have never coming. OOh sorry I have hard comment of these. Thank you

name: Lucy L.
review: Weird hotel, nobody answer the phone even if I have try day and night just to confirm the arrival time.

name: Bambang S.
review: This hotel's actually good but the bath room accessories is not complete no soap, towels was really old seem dirty. Air conditioning bad smell need to be services, but over all is not so bad. Breakfast menu's is okay but need more nurses to serve food.

review: Value added is the location near from malioboro district

review: good service.. ramahh staff nya

review: Good hotel, good service, amaris hotel marlioboro yes!!!

review: Meet my expectation. Google location

review: The quality is as the price. The place is so near to Malioboro. The food is good.

name: agus m.
review: Very good hotel, near Malioboro...

name: Arry H.
review: Good service and ok for everything.

name: Raymond M. L.
review: The place is strategic and helpful.

review: Nice, comfortable resort. Good location. Fast Wifi.

name: Dhanny D.
review: The place so strategic near Malioboro, the service so great

review: Comfortable, clean, good response and delicious breakfast

review: No recommend. No professional hotel like 4 star hotel.

name: Guest-xywgg1
review: Low hospitality of the front office. Parking space is limited and not convenient. Low quality of breakfast for a 4-star hotel.

name: Budiman S. S. L.
review: Noisy and when check in, without seing clearly the booking confirmation, the front office said the room was full.and hacve to wait until afternoon. But after I told them, i have booked and paid on that day, she gave me the keys. In the morning, I could not sleep, because maintenance still work so is very noisy.

name: Yimmy O. Y.
review: No entertainment and the bar closed too early.

name: Heru S.
review: the room is not in accordance with the order

name: Astien S.
review: I need the original receipt from the hotel for my reimbursement. But, the hotel can't provide any Cash Receipt because I booked this hotel via app.. Whereas, other hotels always able to provide the receipt no matter online or direct booking...

name: Agus H.
review: Bad coordination, good location, limited breakfast.

name: fajar k.
review: The hotel staff were actually friendly however they needed to upgrade their ability in running the so called " hospitality".

name: Ion Z. K.
review: The wifi was worst. Dinning table is not enough for all of guest in high season. The staff was cool and have a great attitude.

name: Hesty H.
review: The location is very near to the airport which was right for me. The staffs were friendly. Unfortunately, the pillow on the bed was hard, the bathroom was smell not nice, the cleaning service did not refill the toiletries and the breakfast menu was horrible. This is a new hotel so maybe they need many improvements.

name: Kow e.
review: Front desk ask too much questions. Did not recognize that I have been staying there many times

name: Ahmad R. F.
review: Very close to the airport. The hot shower is not stable.

name: Hapiana A. S. P.
review: Parking area needed more space. When I arrived at this place, it was rainy and security didn't give us permission to parking in basement. Then, we must parked in beside hotel and whats is going on. In the fact, this hotel didn't have door in beside. so, we must to walked until lobby in rainy day. it was so bad..

name: Guest-8x595x
review: Great for front office with warm welcome. I want to stay there if a travelling to yogya but i am dissapointed when found much dust of floor in my double deluxe room. Breakfast is not special but pls take your room cleaness. This is.new hotel ....generally are ok with price is ok compared with others hotel room in same class or level.

name: Rizaldi Y.
review: very well place. they give me a welcome drink. I got problem on my room card and they fix it immediately. very humble staff. swimming pool, gym & rooftop are open for all based on protocol. thank you so much

name: Angela S. S.
review: I love being here. Staff is super friendly and pro! Room is perfectly clean. I will return for sure.

name: Nurlita P.
review: A very gleeful stay. I hope I can stay longer. The room is spacious, they accommodate my request. It's clean and comfy, and very unique as the wall between shower room and the bedroom is made of clear glass LOL, still don't know what is that for. Their breakfast menu is the best. Various choice and delicious. Strategic location as it's right across the airport. The room doesn't offer much TV channel thou, but it's not a big deal as they provided fast wifi so I can stream on my phone. Be dully noted that the snacks, big mineral water, and beverages in the refrigerator are not free.

name: farah a.
review: clean room, staff and the foods are great

name: LIDYA
review: So nice and comfort in there.. Thank you for the great service.. I ll be there next time if I trip to jogja again... See ya..

name: Sofia N.
review: The room is spacious, modern and clean. The location is perfect, just walking distance to airport and lots of nearby restaurants. The famous Yu Djum is only less than 1 km. Highly recommended for those who have to stay near airport.

name: Rony R.
review: great hotel. clean bedroom and bathroom. right just in front of the airport.

name: David C.
review: Great hotel with great location near airport

name: Mira R. M.
review: Good room and the pool is incredible. The infinity pool view is directly to the aiport when we can see the airplanes landing or take off. The food is tasty and various. I enjoyed the BBQ dinner on the infinity sky bar. The foods and music are also great. Will come back again. üòä

name: Tony S.
review: Clean and nice room.

name: Tony S.
review: clean and nice room....

name: Susan f.
review: I love large room, clean and swimming pool with good view.

name: Happy N. W. A.
review: Clean room, adorable price with 4-star facilities, great food menu.

name: Fatkhur R. A.
review: Room is quite, service is great, roof top have pool and fitness center with great view of adisucipto airport. Will visit this hotel again next trip to jogja

name: Hilda F. F.
review: The best hotel near airport. affordable price but high quality.

name: Bogi S.
review: Nice hotel, near to airport.

name: Corry R.
review: I booked and arrived to this hotel "great" expectation. However, drama started right on my first night. The hotel was so noisy. The service was very unsatisfying. We brought up a concern about the "lukewarm" hot water. Yet, after 2 days and billions of requests and complains made, on our last day, the problem was- at last- fixed. People there were very inconsiderate, screaming down the hallway. I could even hear their conversation from inside their rooms. In conclusion, bad noise insulation, very poor service, and average breakfast menu. I'd personally give 5 stars only for its location. Never ever want to go back again nor recommend this hotel to any human being in this planet.

name: Yenita S. H.
review: AC not cold and the bad is not really clean for sensitive skin

name: Silvia N. L.
review: Electrical problem during nighttime

name: Didik S.
review: It is very expensive and not clean

name: Bagus E.
review: The A/C feel so hot for 3-star hotel

name: Ny D. A.
review: we arrived at 19 (pm) but the receptionist (Miss Ega) very sinistis said that our reservation just for 1 (one) room. I'm very angry and I show our reservation through "agent". I already paid for 2 rooms. Ega never say "sorry". I never come back to Pesonna Hotel anymore. please gave feedback to Ega. i'm very disappointed to her.

name: aisshah r. d.
review: Some policy did not make us comfortable. The other people sounds / voice in other room clearly heard and make us can‚Äôt sleep.

name: Haerani
review: Too much noisy and service is not good

name: Satrio P.
review: Not bad at all. Very close to malioboro.

name: chen y.
review: others ok. only no swimming pool, no gym. too regret.

name: Rahmat A.
review: Everything was good but too much noises from outside room (aisle & other rooms).

name: sri r. g.
review: The hotel location is very near to Pasar Beringharjo and Mirota Batik. The receptionist officer was very nice and helpful. The room isnnot so bright so its kind of creepy and then AC is broken so there's some water that keep continue fall down to floor.

name: Guest-b24v7s
review: I stay at 620, the room was good, facility was good also. But bathtowel in the room are yellow spot not only little but to much.need improve from housekeeping.

name: John O. N.
review: Safety box was lock at arrival, ask reception 2 time for make open but noting happened.

name: Michael W.
review: Good services and good location.

name: Rommy C.
review: its okay... a bid old and need refreshment..

name: Intan I.
review: Near from malioboro street, good place, delicious food.

name: Ayu S.
review: So far the best hotel near market and station. Very recommended.

name: Iqbal H. a.
review: The meal is great. The service is really great. Love it

name: James D. E. L.
review: The room was clean and many choices for breakfast

name: Eko F.
review: Friendly staff and cozy atmosphere

name: Hendry G.
review: Great hotel... very recomended...

name: YURRY S.
review: Close to malioboro just walk about 5 minute... breakfast great.. the room is clean

name: LILIS S.
review: strategic locations, hotel comfortable

name: Aginta F. N. W.
review: Very recommended place to stay in jogja, it has great view, comfortable, clean, great staff, near malioboro, and the food is tasty...I will stay in this hotel again when I go to jogja next time...

name: Idang F.
review: Very very recommended hotel in yogya

name: Nina
review: I believe that this hotel will be very famous in the future. Everything is so perfect.

name: erika a.
review: Great location, excellent staffs,

name: Deni N.
review: All is well, the room clean and so wide.

name: Feras A. m.
review: Good service, good room, good price.

name: Mamun F.
review: We were happy to stay this hotel. We booked 2 rooms for my family. It was pleasant and clean. We didn't expect we got Al-Quran and Mukena for prayer in this hotel. We also loved the foods for breakfast. The location is very close to Jalan Malioboro so we just walked there.

name: Rosanna I.
review: Bad room. Very old, bad smell, bad bed (very old), dark, lots of mosquito. Bad experience.

name: Erik A. C.
review: The water in the hotel to take shower was contaminated. Was yellow in color and was salty

name: Ruthly V.
review: Meal and service was bad. Didn't look like 5 star hotel at all.

name: Guest-albjuv
review: The room are so hot, the AC is not good at all.

name: Dina H.
review: You'll stay at the new building which equal to 3 stars hotel. They said, because of covid so the closed the old building. Better they should stop selling the hotel name and stated that ‚ÄúNew Grand Mirage Hotel‚Äù only without any 5 star hotel label. Very dissapointed, only 1 pool adult, no bar/restaurant open, little choice or breakfast, dirty beach (no private beach, no bench, guard, or any water activities), lack of staff in public facilities, there are so many local seller at the beach. Luckily, there is kids water park so my kids still enjoy the hotel. With price above 1 billion rupiahs, you can get more service&facilities at nearby real 5 stars hotel.

name: DENIS P. G.
review: Advertised as 5 star hotel. On arrival the security of the 5 star hotel tells you it is closed for renovation and sends you to the family pension in another building 300 meters from here. If you want to pay the high price and end up in pop hotel.. Then this place is for you. Beware. Scam.

name: Febi N.
review: I felt old room and the smell like storage room. The spider web over the bed and made us uncomfortable. The food was not so good. The good thing was only the beach beside/behind the hotel.

name: Putu Y. M.
review:
They made us park across the street because their tiny parking space are full. Checking out with bird poo all over the car.
Turns out the kids club is on 'the other side' of the hotel. 
Putting the tidy up sign on the door only the be passed by, until we make the call to the manager.
Paying for an extra bed to be said with additional charge for breakfast. Double checking the next day, it was inclusive.
The staff at breakfast are more busy chatting among themselves, often heard making unnecessary comments.
Never once been offered a baby chair, have to get it on your own.
Try reaching the manager on duty only to be told to reach him on his cell, in casual way.

This old 5 star hotel need a serious change up.

name: andri m. i.
review: Good view, clean room, private beach. Nice pool and kids playground.

name: Alfin
review: -Ordered for ocean view, but we got half garden half ocean -Facilities was not so good (old) -Food was good (all inclusive) -Service was good, except the discriminative services -In some services, the foreigner tourists were more prioritized than me as local tourists !

name: Alfin
review: - Ordered for ocean view, but we got half garden half ocean ! - Facilities was not so good (old) ! - Food was good (all inclusive) - Service was good, except the discriminating services - In some services, the foreigner tourists are prioritized than me as local tourists !

name: Yunus O.
review: private beach, near nusa dua, uluwatu and jimbaran, currently under renovation.

name: Andy
review: Cleanliness: I am still found many dust under the bed and aqua cup under my bed. Please prepare bath mat or door mat in front room number 316 and 317, because it will help, when the guest is drying his or her feet before entering the room. Location: location is good and maybe some of people didn't know if there is grand mirage apartment behind starbucks benoa because there isn't signage but there is security to manage parking area and take care of the safety. there is no access from ground floor grand mirage apartment to starbucks benoa building. Comfort: the room which I booked really comfortable. I booked 3 bedroom apartment and that was very huge that room fit up to 12 adult people. I stayed there with 10 adult people including me and 2 children, it is very suitable for family vacation. they provide good tea but the flavour which I wanted they didn't have it such as earl grey, chamomile and jasmine. Service: the service was great Food: they provide good bacon and enjoyable buffet

name: Agustinus H. P.
review: Need renovation & increase the food variants.

name: Handy L.
review: Very exciting place to stay. 2 nights there and I felt sorry didn't book more. No more rooms available to adjust. Staffs very helpful especially room service. ‚≠ê Excellent ‚≠ê.

name: Ni Made S. U.
review: Nice resort suitable for family. Kids friendly indeed. We love the kids suite with the bunk beds. Spacious room and cute decoration. Although the gym was closed but it was OK. We still had great time here

name: Irfadillah Y.
review: Staycation only one night, but my kids love this resort. Building for family 2br suite different with hotel building. Looks new and more modern. We like our room interior. Friendly staff. Delicious tasty breakfast and juice was fresh. Good facilities for kids with indoor and outdoor play ground. My mom and kids enjoy the routine on hotel pool. Definitely will be back again

name: Yock Y.
review: very nice hotel for family vacation, nice room, nice beach, and very happy with kids facilities specially the water park, swimming pool, kids play ground and everything.

name: Arief D.
review: A nice and good place for family vacation

name: R DIMAS D. P.
review: Very comfortable place for children especially for grand mirage new building. üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº

name: Dwi P. B. W.
review: It was great experience to stay on this hotel. Make you feel like in other country. The private beach of this hotel is very beautiful, the staff is very kind. Breakfast food is really delicious

name: Yayuk I. A.
review: I Love this place. Such as a paradise. I came to Grand Mirage Resort and Thalasso Bali last month with My Family. My father in law is in Stroke Medication, and we planned to a secret trip for him. He's so happy when arrived on the site. My Mom in law was excited too. The Scenery so amazing, The Beach, the Pool are great! I hope someday I can comeback with my big family.

name: tommy a.
review: Amazing, the hotel is clean and luxurious, view is amazing, the relax ambiance. WiFi is fast, breakfast us huge choice and delicious. the front office staff also great in service. I surely will use this hotel in my next trip to bali.

name: Lilianty L.
review: Fabulous hotel i've ever stay, the facilities really good for our family's vacation, thanks for grand mirage hotel

name: Jeffry W.
review: Best place for holiday with family

name: Dimas C.
review: Nice and clean, kids friendly, 1 minuite walk to beach

name: Guest-se0iaz
review: Clean, nice facility for kids and adult, good service...love it

name: Guest-aig4ad
review: I was stayed at Family room with the two kids. The room is very clean and the hotel ambience also nice. The hotel have direct access to the beach

name: Andry
review: l=Location is good, building is quite old but its still a 5-star hotel. Got private beach.

name: Novita
review: Very like the resorts and the private beach, all hotel accommodation and hotel service is very excellent, all the staff is very friendly as well as the food is very tasty. Really love to stay here, me and my husband were very happy stay here, we will be back again stay here on our next vacation ‚ù§

name: Jane
review: Clean room, friendly staff, beautiful private beach.

name: Wahyu B. S.
review: Nice hotel, many children playground and activities, good for family

name: Guest-tokew4
review: When check in we found dirty cups looks after used and not be washed. Food is good taste but less various so boring for 5 days stay. Many flies fly around at breakfast room

name: Fatimah A.
review: The staff weren‚Äôt welcoming, nobody help to bring my luggage. In the middle of the night I was so thirsty and ask for extra mineral water, I‚Äôve been waiting for more than half an hours but nobody‚Äôs come to my room.

name: Irvan P. D.
review: Room is very good and comfort, but breakfast restaurant was not higienis, too many flies and insect in the seating area.

name: Budiarto
review: location wise is quite good, but the problem is in the room, the AC is not working, a technician has come to fix it, but eventually its still not cold at all. will not come back to this hotel again

name: Magnus R. D.
review: the hotel was very noisy. A lot of things didn't work properly, wifi was noisy, the phone in the room didn't work To the hotels credit, they did give me a nice upgrade, in that room there was a strong light from the wifi which gave me a bad nights sleep the first night. The location is also next to a busy road.

name: William T.
review: The breakfast menu seems like cheaper hotel. No soap in the bathroom.

name: Fajrina E. P.
review: Good deal for a good hotel. Room was perfect for 3girls on backpacker trip.

name: David U. A. B.
review: The room is suite clean, and big enough for the price. Lack of amenities in the bathroom but its okay.

name: I Kadek
review: Good service amazingg will come back.

name: Fajrina E. P.
review: Great deals for a great hotel.

name: Eve C. A.
review: Very good hotel at affordable price. The staffs are all kind and professional, helpful too. It's located at Sunset Road, near Krisna souvenir shop. So it is easy to go hear and there, with car or motorcycle. Very recommended hotel to stay in. Thank you for the hospitality from all the hotel staffs (receptionist, security guards, bell boy, room service, etc).

name: I Nengah J. A.
review: The room are clean and spacious. all the staff is very polite. definitely stay again in the future

name: Muhammad A.
review: the hotel room was good, the location was good, the breafast good

name: Olga O.
review: comfy, but the service is not really good. I stayed for 2 nights, and asking for tidy up the room but they didn't tidy up the room well.

name: Jeffa F. F.
review: Awesome. Thanks traveloka.

name: Steffany M. U.
review: Great experience! Booked this hotel with promo and turns out the hotel was beyond expectation. The room was clean, the staffs were so helpful, the hotel location was super strategic. Definitely gonna back here when visit Bali.

name: Yunita T.
review: Super strategic location. I drive around Legian and Sunset road, end up always near our hotel. The room is super clean, I got the room in 1st floor near the lobby and I wanna bring the sofa home. So comfortable. Overall, kudos to the staffs. So helpful!

name: Franky F.
review: Best recommendedBrits Hotel Legian.

name: Hidayat S.
review: The place was really good. The location is strategic to reach everywhere. Must stay here üëçüèª

name: Irawan
review: Very friendly staff, good location and room also clean. üëçüëçüëç

name: Fensilia d. a.
review: Location was Great near with My Office and Room was Claen

name: Rispa H. L.
review: that was nest hospitality. that suitable hotel and closed to other public facilities. easy to get food arround the hotel.

name: Rezky W. S.
review: Really cozy place to stay, good hospitality from the staff, comfortable bed with affordable price

name: Hanna M. S.
review: Tempat dan pelayanan Excellent. Really love in this hotel hope to we're come back again üòä

name: Nini S. K.
review: Excellent location, and room was clean. This hotel has excellent value for money, they use good sanitaries (taps, toilets and the like) for such good pricing. We also liked the window side daybed/sofa, however it has a cigarette burn mark on it.

name: Pixarani N.
review: Very satisfied with all the services. Space is also very clean and neat.

name: Fahmi R.
review: Everything was good! This hotel very recommended for you. And ‚Äúbli angga‚Äù one of staff front office on that hotel very helpful. I requested many time to bli angga to arrangement my room was great! Thank you so much bli angga. Can't wait to visit bali and brits hotel

name: Indra P.
review: It was my first experience to stay at Brits Hotel. I loved it. The hotel is quite big, it has pool and quite complete fitness equipment. The room is comfy and lightly bigger compared to other common budget hotels. Everything was working properly in the room. I would love to come back. Its value for money too.

name: Ryadi T. A.
review: was reluctant to choose this place at first after reading the comment section. But I proved it. It was quite experience having stayed here. The crews were really friendly and kind. The room was big enough and what I loved most was the extra sofa preserved, did enjoy in that space. The location was searchable and reachable. The facilities such as pool and gym were convenient. And last but not least the price was absolutely reasonable. Thanks for the warm service.

name: Achmad Y.
review: nice hotel, room and bath room are clean and comfort

name: Yulia D. M.
review: Comfortable room, friendly staff. Overall, very good. Will comeback again. Thanks Brits hotel and Traveloka. More success for you both!

name: Panna D.
review: The aircon was dirty and not cold. the family room is small and uncomfortable. service is bad and slow

name: Esa P.
review: I didn't get non-smoking room. Mosquito can be found in the room.

name: Rohaizad P.
review: Upon arrival very slow check-in by the Reception to find a room at 2130 hours, room is not 100% ready to sell and clean. Order room service but most of the food in the menu is not available. Only available nasi goreng which is cold and tasteless. No toiletries available in the room, and only one bath towel place in the toilet as two persons occupied this room. Very disappointing of this hotel.

name: Fredy L.
review: The AC was not cool, there was also water leakage in the bathroom...

name: Aloysius M. M.

review: - Smelly "orange" pillow - Bathroom door that can't be closed properly.

review: Toilet was not clean. Location is not good.

name: Haryanto H.
review: The price is a bit too high. The location is not so good. It's difficult to find a taxi and difficult to go anywhere, especially the beach.

name: Anonymous
review: Excellent hotel room for vacation to Bali either alone or with family. Good location where it is near to beach and tourist spot. Room is clean and spacious. Will recommend this hotel to my friends who want to have a vacation in Bali.
